TopicTitle: Is there any way to change the scale of Mechjeb's drop-down menu and Kerbal Engineer's HUD?

Articles.Content:
I like changing the UI scale to fit my needs, but Kerbal Engineer and Mechjeb's buttons and HUD seem a little out of proportion for me. So, is there any way to change their sizes?

 

KER's HUD really doesn't fit in with my UI scale. An option to have KER's HUD align with my UI scale would be nice, but are there any current solutions for this?

 

Mechjeb's drop down menu is also nice, but at the same time, out of proportion with my UI scale. Pretty much the same situation as KER but with Mechjeb.

 

So (for the fifth time), is there any solution to the proportions of the HUD and buttons?

I'm not in front of the game to check but under the impression that option exist tor KER. Granted being awhile since I messed with the setting. 

May you clarify what exactly you want to do? Maybe a image or two would help visualize.
